Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: The buzz is around the people who are excited about the recent budget. Australians from all walks of life are hailing the Labor Party's efforts in providing critical relief measures for Aussies. The budget's focus on gender equity and closing the pay gap is particularly commended while historic investments in Medicare and energy price relief are also highly lauded. The budget's responsible cost of living relief and austerity measures are equally emphasize  as it sets the foundations for a stronger Australian economy in the future.
